content.detailedDescription:
Like any other morning ritual opened the living room window blinds for daylight. found mysterious and unusually large white imprint. an erie feeling i felt immediately. such a large wing suggesting a wingspan around 6-8 feet. large body imprint and ratio to wingspan. that path of observation concluded with an unnerving reaction to its head. it looked evil and demonic. the pointed ears. its eyes. if it wasn't for what i am about to say next i would have never taken this investigation this far.
my eyes are seeing what looks like "teeth"!! yes teeth!!! 

wishing to document this i took digital camera shots from different interior angles for better defintion. instinctively i then got the outside water hose to erase it. found no feathers below elevated pw.
then took camera sim card to a major tv store. wanted the best lcd resolution for enhancement and largest tv size for scale to my 72" x 60"
picture window. technician implemented and confirmation was made of teeth.
moreso fellow workers where schocked by its evil and demonic look too.
this is my ufo and it desperately needs identification especially when the veiwing audience all agrees. 

please notice that the different camera angles somehow give a different look to the static image. almost holographic. 

incidentally i told my story to the neighbor. he too had an encounter. breifly saw it and heard its large flapping wings. quickly ran inside and prayed with his mexican wife. the catholic cemetery borders both our backyards. asked church for blessing but they declined. went the opposite to a psychic and she said "a sleeper demon" entered the house. 

hopefully the attached pictures will help you help me define this.
content.summary: Overnite white imprint found on living room picture window.

content.detailedDescription: I don't feel comfortable writing the story out here. i'm more than willing to talk over the phone, but i could spend 30mins doing it and i still wouldn't be happy with it. it's something better told than read, or at least written by me. sorry.
content.summary: Blue orb traveling north of horsetooth res,

content.detailedDescription:
Puzzling observation in night sky

on either august 31 or september 1 at about 11:15 pm edt while sitting on the back deck of my house i saw something unusual in the night sky that has been driving me crazy ever since.  to avoid any misunderstanding regarding what i am about to relate, let me first provide a little background about myself in that regard.  first of all i am an experienced sky watcher and from time to time will actually use high powered binoculars to observe a variety of activities in the sky including aircraft, natural phenomena, wild life, etc.  i am also interested in astronomy and have a telescope which i use on occasion to view celestial objects including planets, stars, galaxies and the moon, etc.  my point is that i am very experienced at what i am talking about.  as a case in point, a few years ago while viewing the southwestern sky at dusk, i was fortunate enough to observe a meteorite come through the atmosphere in my direction.  it made the local newspapers and was a prelude to a series of sightings that occurred about a week or two later in the bucks county pa and nj area of the country.  as a matter of fact over a period of a few years i have observed three meteorites come through the atmosphere, but that was the only time i saw it happen in daylight.  in the night time sightings they were basically what appeared to be basketball sized fireballs streaking across the sky.  but in the daylight sighting what i saw was a trail of tumbling smoke coming in my direction.  this took place over a period of about 15 to 20 seconds and then the smoke trail dissipated over a period of about 5 minutes or so.   

on the negative side, i have never observed a satellite or the international space station from earth although from what i understand it is possible to do so by naked eye.

before going into what really prompted this post let me first relate what led up to it the day before.  while looking up in the southeastern direction of a clear but slightly hazy sky sometime around noon i saw what appeared to be the fuselage of a large passenger liner high in the atmosphere.  what got my interest was simply the fact that i could not see its wings and didn���t hear any noise from its engines.  so, it could possibly have been a dirigible from what i could tell.  to be sure i went into the house to get my binoculars.  but by the time i came back out it had already gone over the roof top and was no longer visible from that location so i just shrugged it off as i have done countless times in the past.  i could have gone out front, or around the side of the house but it was no big deal so i didn���t bother.  the point is that this was nothing new to me and has happened in the past where when view with binoculars i could see the wings of the aircraft that because of haze were not visible with the naked eye.  now, for what i saw the following night.

while looking at the night sky at about 11:15 pm in the same southeastern direction i noticed what appeared to be a very bright star (or possibly the light/s of an airplane) peek through a faint cloud in that part of the sky.  it only lasted about 3 to 5 seconds and then went out as if blocked by the cloud.  it seemed like it could be moving in my direction but it didn���t last long enough for me to be sure.  as i continued to watch the sky including in the direction i thought the object might be moving in, about 5 to 10 minutes later it suddenly lit up again.  but it was now far in front of the faint cloud and in a perfectly clear part of the night sky.  again the light was on for only about 3 to 5 seconds and went out again.  i quickly went inside the house to get my binoculars but by the time i came out, whatever it was never lit up again.  to be clear on this, i never actually saw the object but only the light from it.  in both cases it was as bright as a very bright star and seemed to be a single light and not multiple lights as used on aircraft.  and in both cases, it simply turned on and then went out a few seconds later.  there was no sound of any kind associated with it.  i have no idea of what it was but have never seen an aircraft do that.  it would probably be a violation of aeronautical law to fly at night without lights.  it is driving me crazy trying to figure out what it could have been.  whether it was related to what i had seen the day before, i have no idea.  it came from the same general direction of the sky but was moving toward the left of me whereas the object the previous day went to the right of me as it passed overhead.  as a final note it should be understood that the former willow grove naval air station is about a mile or two away in the general direction, although about 45 degrees more to the south, that the light came from.
content.summary: Starlike light that turned on for about 3-5 seconds, went off, then came on again about 5-10 minutes later as it crossed the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Wel, one night im with some friends and we decide to go to a local playground near a school where they have taken down all the trees for the kids. it was light when we got there and it turned dark rather quickly i remember, but we never thought anything of it. as soon as it turned dark i wanted to sit around and look at stars as i normally do because i have a dream to be an astronomer, so we did. i noticed a few lights that were moving in the sky and with the amount of air traffic out this way i didnt think it was anything unnatural. as i continued looking up more staring appearing and as it caught my eye i started noticing the lights would come on then go off after a few seconds, or they would blink as if in a code then another would simotaeuosly blink . then all of a sudden i seen about had to be over 10 or 15 lights all going in different directions in the sky all blinking in different patterns. i watched the flight path to see if it could be identified as a jet but i dont think i know of a jet yet that can take right angle turns and slow down almsot to a stop instantly after zooming acrosss the sky. we continued to watch these lights until they all dispersed and we retreated back to my house. after the strange appearance we went to lay on my roof to look at the stars again to see if we could find anything else. two things happened while on the roof.Both i encountered but only on of these did one of my friends see. the one we both seen was a bright flash in the sky jsut behind a thin cloud cover u could mostly see behind. now this light was more of a strob light or a really powerful explosion of light off a high powered prejector but it was in midair as if it was cloud to cloud lightning but this was not lightning and this cloud could not have produced it being as thin as it was. my friends girlfriend who was up at the moment wasnt lookin but claims to have seen in her perifial vision a bright flash. now the one i seen and they didnt is when i was laying down looking up and they were kissing, i know it seems like its made up but i dont have time to be typing all this making this up, while they were kissing i seen almost a long missle shaped ship with a transparant bottom shoot overhead towards the light, and i coul have sworn i seen more than one but it was so fast if you bliked u would most likely miss them. anyways this happened all in the same night. 
and even before all this happened i have been seeing strange lights floating and flying stangly and just disappearin all in the sky.. i hope you find my story credible because i have never told anyone.
content.summary: Hard to believe yet unexplainable

content.detailedDescription: Between 10:00 and 10:15 pm, 9/9/11, there was an orange ufo.  it was larger than an airplane and lower than an airplane would fly.  it was circular and orange.  it came from the north and then hovered for a few minutes.  it was quite bright.  then it looked like it was spinning before it started to shrink in size.  i'm not sure why, but right before it started to shrink it was hard for me to look at.  there were 4 of us in the parking lot who watched it.  i never heard anything on the news, but there were  many people around because it was about 15-20 minutes after the paw paw wine festival fireworks ended over maple lake.
content.summary: There was a bright orange light, larger than a plane, lower than an airplane.  it hovered for several minutes, and decreased in size until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Over a dozen round ojjects hovering but slowly moving, or staying stationary as earth moved. they have been here all week at night.
they are round and a few can be mistaken for venus or jupiter, but 
lower than cloud cover and much larger than a normal star or satelite,
some can be seen even though not lit up, especially thru the scope i 
used after visual sighting.  tonite (9-10-11) is clear and i watched 
them for over an hour.  there was a cluster of six that trailed the
bright one.  there were 4-6 bright onesd scattered at distance.  the closest one was quite the britest.  i have viewed it at least 4 nights
this weel from @1am to 4am.  other nights were too cloudy to see.
by searching with my scope, i detected some that i could not see exceept
thru the scope.  the cluster is very faint visually, clear when scoped.
the cluster moved around each other in no particular shape.  i watched them go from round to thin as they assumed disc shaping.  they seem to be 
normally orb shaped.  the closest ones can be detaile thru the scope.
they look like round balls of white rough surface characteristics.  i
liken it to a softball or baseball without a hide cover.  you can see lines and ridges in a haphazard fashion making a type of texture more 
than anything.  a black line went from top to bottom, down the center.
you could see the object rotating, bur it seemed to mostly be back and forth by quarter and half turns.  it sometimes changes shape like a balloon that deflating or being compressed (smashed) into another form
than round.  it sometimes is viewed asa quarter moon or half moon style.
it appears malleable at times, becoming a cone or disc or quarter moon.
the strangest thing about it is some shapless blobs appearing on it's
surface.  all roundish or blobish or paisley shaped.  sone seemed static,
but some appeared to move.  at times they appeaared 3-dimensioinal,
rather than always flat on the surface.  i would best describe them as
giant bacteria or virus cells that appear round under a microscope.
their behavior mimiced the same.  pac man comes to mind.
content.summary: Spotted several round orbs all week single brite & clustered flat light.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through sherman, tx on 9 sept 2011.  myself and another witness noticed two very bright star like objects above the horizon, south and west of sherman, i could not tell how far away they were, could have been many miles.  they were too bright and too large to be stars, and they slowly moved apart from eachother over a period of about 5 minutes.  the brighter of the two suddenly vanished. 2 minutes later the dimmer of the two vanished as well.  they were not aircraft, but there was an aircraft in the area during the time of the sighting.  i have no idea what we witnessed, i'm not claiming that they were spaceships or anything like that, just hoping someone can shed some light on what we possibly saw.
content.summary: 2 star-like objects, slowly moving, suddenly vanish

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at approximately 4:00am while sitting  on the toilet to void (pee) lights lihtg up the room while i  was sitting  there.  my thought was " polices or someone walking their dog shining light in my window at my house. finished voiding, stood up looked down to street (nothing)?, looked up,  across street low enough i could see lights in room, bottom of a silver triangular shaped vessel. three white lights one red.  very low to earth could see all. went toget get glasses and see if husband awake,  returned to window,  not in view. vessel heading northwest.
content.summary: 4am, went to bathroom, lights in br, police lightsetc? off toilet looked out window,  street, up,  silver triangle object. 3 white1red light, low to light up my toilet area.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband were going to go outside on our deck to view the northern lights that were supposed to be bright this evening of sept 9th into the 10th.  the time was right around midnight. i went outside first and looked up to see a bright star to the east about 50 degrees over the horizon and then noticed 2 bright red lights coming directly towards me in the direction from the southeast towards the northwest.  they were flying one above the other but not in a straight line to each other.  the top was slightly to the right of the bottom one.  they were very bright and got brighter the closer that they got.  they did not flash or blink.  there was no noise.  i ran inside the house to get my husband to come see.  then we watched for a few seconds and i returned inside again to tell my kids to come and see.  we all watched the lights come closer and i kept saying "what is that?"  i ran inside again and got my digital camera but when i tried to video the lights my camera froze and would not film.  my son ran inside to get my iphone but it would not pick up the lights.  about this time, being about 3-3 1/2 minutes they changed direction while almost right above us and travelled straight north.  we were not scared but very curious and confused. i said that i thought that they were chinese lanterns, but they changed direction, stayed in the exact distance apart from each other and did not flicker, and were much more brighter.   once they finished changing direction, the lights faded out like they were only visible from the front.  when we checked the wind direction from the nearest weather reports, the wind was not coming from the direction that they lights came from.  for us there on the deck watching, there was no wind and the night was warm and still.
content.summary: 2 reddish light aproaced from south east overhead and then turned to fly north.

content.detailedDescription:
Dec 24 1999 rural albion nebraska,man 30, wife29, son 7 and half.  diving home after christmas eve  visiting parents one half mile from my place,still clear night,bright moon and snow on ground. as driving to my farm saw to right side of car a large black object going same speed low  to the ground.  i said to my wife and son look at that! they saw it.  continued to follow it past my place roughly three quarters of a mile. it then stopped in mid air.  we never went over 40 miles an hour. i shut car off and got out and looked up at this huge triangular object. it made no sound.  three lights on each end of the bottom of triangle. i stood and watched for several minutes. my wife, very upset was yelling for me to get
back into car. my son said nothing, but watched.  the object then slowly turned north and to me just disappeared. we all looked at the night sky totally bewildered. i got back in car and went home. we did not sleep well.  my wife did make a report on internet, but nothing came of it. having taken flying lessons, i know this was no plane.  we told some people but was not received well. my son never wanted to talk about it till lately. he is 19 in collage and is considering hypnosis about the event. he thinks i should too since i was outside. would like advice thanks.  darrelltexley@yahoo.Com
content.summary: Huge triagle black 3 bottom lights

content.detailedDescription: It drifted toward the sun and just vanished. i could have hit it with a baseball. saw it again that evening while being driven in car, over a vast field.
content.summary: High noon in the anza borrego desert hovering 10 feet above house i was in.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, well i've never spoke of this outside my family. but this has haunted me for years. i cannot explain what i saw, because for years i have listened to other reports and have never heard of any other experience like i had. first of all, i am an above average intelligent person, with common sense and problem solving skills. but i still cannot reconcile what i saw.
i lived in lake havasu, az 93-94. what i went thru caused me to pack up my entire house and leave overnite, and move an entire state away. at first i tried to talk about it to others, but after much ridicule, i stopped and kept it to myself.
but now, for some reason, my senses are begging me to reach out. in fact i am so frightend of what i experienced that i only mention the high points of my experience to see if anyone has had anything similar. 
so, for my own piece of mind i"ll give this one last try:
just for the record the security officer at my work put in his official nightly report an ufo experience for the same night. it was not like mine. my experience happened over my home. also more to this, not willing to put here. my daughter was only 3 at the time. 
dusk, vacuum of silence, cloaked, immense, capital letter i, slow moving, low orbit(maybe 40 stories) lit from within 4 half globes each side just inside of the ends. things were milling around inside. the embryonic, electrical smell. 
2 weeks later. came home to look thru my front window to see someone or something (dark figure) running out the back kitchen door. packed up that night and moved out of state the next morning.
since then, i feel watched. a spooky kinda feeling. night terrors and sweats, and still to his day experience the strangest things. almost what some would call a haunting. oh i just want to put this to bed. if anyone out there has had anything like this happen to them, i just need validation. thxh
content.summary: Haunting experience

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember the exact date but i think it was around thanksgiving in 2010.  my wife and i were driving back home after dinner at my parents house somewhere between 8pm-10pm, dark outside and clear skies.  the drive home was from boulder to loveland.  i took the back roads.  after driving through hygiene and crossing highway 66 via n 75th st., we saw three lights - where the points of a triangle would be.  it appeared to have a very large wing span (if it had wings).  for example, looking at the hills to the east as you drive north between hwy 66 and the sharp turn on n 75th,the lights spanned the entire big hill with the weather station or whatever that place is.  at first i thought the lights were coming from there.  once we turned the sharp turn on n 75th we realized the lights were way out there, possibly over mead and appeared to be maybe 10,000ft.  after the turn, n 75th turns into woodland rd., its a pretty open view of the sky.  the lights didn't flicker or move at all, and as we drove east on woodland rd. the object didn't get any bigger - so it must have been far away.  i turned left onto n 83rd st., the lights still shining, and drove up the hill.  over the hill, the trees block the view of the east for a mile or two, but once a clear view was able, near yellowstone rd., we looked for the lights and they were gone.

i'm curious to know if others around my area have witnessed anything similar and what the logical explanation might be.  i've seen video clips shown on tv of similar light formations in the sky.
content.summary: A three light triangle in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I must be completely out of my mind for doing this, but here goes.

i was pitching a fit to go with my mother. she was dressed like she was going to go shopping.  i get the distinct feeling someone else was there, but don't remember seeing anyone.  mom told me i could not go this time.  she was unusually calm, for my obnoxious behavior.  she told me to go to the bedroom and take a nap with my dad and my brother.  i said i would.  but i remember distinctly, that i wasn't tired and i wasn't going to take a nap.  i was going to go play in my room.

my room was the last room on the left at the end of the hall.  my dad and brother had just walked down to my parents room (last bedroom on the right).  my brother's room was on the left, just before mine.  as i passed his room, i looked in.  there was this huge, weird looking head in the window with bigger than normal eyes and it had on a big, blonde wig.  the sun was really bright coming through the window behind it's head.  i knew it had seen me and i was scared.  so i ran to get my dad.  but he and my brother were sprawled out on my parent's bed and they were completely asleep.  i remember thinking that was not right, because they had just came in there.  then a thought that was not my own popped in my head. "you should go to sleep."  so i climbed up on the bed and that is all i remember.

here is some other information.
- my brother's bedroom window looked out into our front yard.
- my mother was pregnant with my sister at this time.
- i was wearing play clothes.
- the sun was shining. it was a very sunny day.

there are some things that are simply, just not right about this, at all.
- why did my dad take off down the hall with my brother while i screamed & yelled at my mother? my dad was the type to snatch you up and tan your hide for acting like that.
- why was my mother so calm, when she was always loud and high strung about most everything?
- who was my mother leaving with? and why can't i remember any one else being there?
- and how did my dad and brother go to sleep so quickly?  and why weren't they laying in the bed like you're supposed to lay in a bed?

i re-visit this memory at least once a year. i usually just file it back away and go on with my life.  but the older i get, the more i want to find out what this is.  growing up, i don't remember ever not having this memory.  periodically, since high school, i have shared this memory with various individuals.  once in a while, i have actually been lucky enough to share it with someone who didn't call me a total nut-job.

where/how can i find someone who can help me figure out what these memories are?  i really want to know.
content.summary: I think i might have seen my mother abducted.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were in his backyard from 10pm untill 3:45am. we had been discussing ufo's and zodiac signs then listening to music that envolved extraterestrial content. then i read my horoscope and it clearly stated id be afraid and intrigued by a new relationship. then my friend noticed a light behind a pine tree in his backyard. i didnt see it so i dismissed his statement and continued on with mine and and quote, i said that dosent make any (word removded) cms flg sense the a huge brite whitish blue light emerged from behind the pine tree went forward about 100- 150 feet then turned and shot into the sky away from us and as quick as we saw it, it dissapeared. this isnt the first time ive seen this light in the sky but never this close and its never turned always a straight path. after the sighting we started feeling weird and both described the same symptoms to each other, a light headedness upset stomach cold and hot sensation just a over all uncomfortability. i was at the time amazed. my friend and i were taping each other but was in such shock it was like punching. after it dissapeared i jumped out of my chair and shouted( word removed) cms flg 09/10/11 09:09 cst was that i was at the time very astonished and couldnt grasp why me and my friend witnessed that. im kind of scared because i have seen the light sense but no where near as close and before also nowhere near as close.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 people in callahan florida see bright light in treetops take off into space........

content.detailedDescription: A very bright star like object caught my eye. it was much brighter then any other star in the sky and after looking at it for a few seconds, it faded out. another star like object appear a few feet (objectively) above it. it then faded out and the first would reappear. by the time i had a camera, only the one object remained, changed color to blue then red then white again. this was seen by five adults. we eventually got tired and went to bed leaving our star like object still hovering.
content.summary: Two star like objects appeared faded out and reappeared numerous times.

content.detailedDescription:
Sept 9, 2011. my son noticed an object in the shy that was flashing different colours and didn't appear to be moving. we live in an area with plane traffic and dark skies, so i assumed it was a plane that was travelling away from us that looked like it was stationary. after 1/2 hr of watching the "plane" it was still appeared to be in the same position. while watching the object, i noticed that the colours were not typical of a regular plane navigational lights. in additional to white and red pulsating lights it also had blue and green. the object was at about 30 degrees on the horizon towards the ne and at a considerable distance.

curious, i brought out the binoculars and the object did not look like a plane and the binoculars were unsteady, so i brought out the dslr with 300mm telephoto lens and took a couple of pictures. because of the distance, i also mounted it on a tripod to steady the picture. 

when viewing the pictures on the camera it looked "disk or cylindrical" shaped, however i assumed that the camera must have been shaking and left a tracer shape. it wasn't until i brought the camera inside uploaded the pictures zoomed in and enhanced the resolution to see the background stars that the cylindrical shape was not caused by camera shake. specifically, i looked at the stars in the background and you will notice that they are perfectly round to a pinpoint (indicating that the camera was not moving). in two of the attached pictures the object is the same disk shape and there is no movement, however in one pictures the object appears to trail something below it and move position (these are long exposure pictures approx. 30 seconds). you can also clearly see the different colours in that picture and the stars in the background are still pinpoints (again no camera shake). 

the object was "pulsating" rather brightly and although you cant see the different colours in two of the pictures, you can see them in the third one (where the object appears to be moving). i also noticed in the picture that the stars appear to be "blanked out" around the object. i am attributing this to the long exposure time and the intensity of the flashing which must have muted out the rather low light intensity of the distant stars around the object. it is now midnight and the object has been visible for several hours. it appears to be slowly moving across the sky which leads me to believe it is some man made object that is tracking with the rotation of the earth. but i still can't resolve the shape nor the colours, nor the reason for the weird 3rd picture.   any input or logical explanation of what the object is would be greatly appreciated. thank you, deirdre
content.summary: Strange stationary object, long duration, pulsating lights change shape

content.detailedDescription:
Relaxing on back deck facing south and observed and object 45 degrees above horizon. object seemed to be a very large aicraft at first but really caught my attention as it seemed to become much brighter.I first dismissed the light as red navigation lights but it soon became obvious that the object was a sort of t or cross shape moving away from me. it seemed to be very large and the light source pulsated and totally illuminated the object. i watched for about 1 minute and it simply went dark. about 1 minute later another object appeared from the west and i called for my wife to confirm what i was seeing. it was much brighter and more of a round light wth a hard form. this object also seemed to pulsate and abruptly fade. i am an aviation nut and can easily identify most any aircraft at a glance. i have also witnessed the passing over of countless satellites and manned spacecraft over the years but this was much different as the form was very distingushable. 2 aircraft were on approach to xna with landing lights on and at fairly low altitude and appeared as normal on such a clear evening. we reside on the landing path approx. 5 miles from xna.
i would explain the obects a satellites normally, but the hard lines defining the shapes and the color and frequency of the light puzzle me.
content.summary: Observed 2 very different objects with similar color pulsating light

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i decided to go to the les schwab amphitheater at around 8:30. we were the only ones there. we walked out to the field and decided to climb this tower that said (do not climb) haha. it was about 12 feet. a minute after we got to the top of it my girlfriend said "did you see that?" i was like what? no. where? ( i thought she was kidding)so i looked out and probably no less than a minute i saw what she was talking about. it looked like 3 ufos that formed a triangle, 2 ufos at the bottom and one at the top. the 2 ufos at the bottom had lights similar to an airplane. ( a white light with a red flashing light right next to it) except these lights were a bit bigger and they weren't moving anywhere. the third ufo that was at the top (the peak of the imaginary triangle shape)that ufo had a bigger light. and that light was white. that light would slowly brighten and look bigger.
the ufos would appear and dissapear. but they always reappeared at the same spot, they never moved. at one point there was a beam between the 2 bottom ufos. just a white skinny light that connected the 2. also at one point the bright white light at the top was bright blue for a while. all of this probably lasted for  10 minutes. also we probably sat on that tower for 4 minutes before we got scared and climbed down. we walked a few feet  towards the ufos and watched them for the remaining of the time. i tried to take a picture with my cell phone. but my cell phone sucks.

- we didnt hear any noise coming from the ufo's
- within the last year we have seen quite a few ufo's together. she has also seen some more ufo's when she was not with me. as have i. they all have seemed different in some way. friends of ours have also seen them while they were with us. we have seen them a lot in burns or, and the one i described was in bend. also about 4 or 5 years ago my friends and i saw a ufo twice in one night in john day or. that was the first one i saw and it was very scary. 
- i would appreciate if you guys emailed me back and told me what you thought.
content.summary: We believe we saw 3 ufos that formed an imaginary triangle. they were hovering in one spot. they'd appear and disappear. at one point we saw a beam of light connected from one ufo to the other.

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating light in the sky white, blueish green and red. drifting away from me. saw exact same thing night before but this time light kept drifting away. planes would go right by it very slowly headed north ...
content.summary: Brampton ontario canada strange light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was moving to california. i was aboard a southwest airline flight in the last leg toward california. i would guess we were somewhere between arizonia and california sometime during late morning. we were at speed and altitude. i happened to look out the window and saw a cylinderical object coming at us at maybe a 60 degree angle at a super high rate of speed. i estimate at probably 6-8 times our rate of speed. it was probably a couple of thousand feet below us. it had things on the outside. i can't remember exactly what. when all of a sudden it came to a complete stop, then turned 90 degrees to the east and accellerated out of sight at an extreme high rate of speed. i heard the guy sitting behind me say " holey s*** ". i turned to him and asked "did you just see that?". he said "i don't know. i just don't know". i asked the pilot about it when deplaning but he pretended he didn't see anything. yea, right.
content.summary: I was in airliner. obect came toward us at high rate, stopped and turned.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were looking for shooting stars lying on our backs on the tramp in the back. it was after 1:00am. yes we were sober =) and out of no where a ufo flew over these apartments directly behind our house going exstremly fast....If i had to guess over 100 miles per hour traveling south. this ufo was huge and had no lights on. it appeared to be long almost like a huge battle ship in the sky. it made no engine sound it just made "moving through the air sound". almost like it was solar powered. my wife and i froze in shock of what we had seen. we both saw it and were just amazed and freaked out by it. it was flying in a straight path and in low air space...Illegal flying "way to low" but super fast. no lights? never seen anything like it...?

fyi: this area has had ufo sightings in past some documented,etc.

note: my wife and i know what we saw. it was real! we share it with friends and they think we are crazy ha ha just kidding... well i am sure some do but they haven't came forward... lol



sicerely-

(name removed to fi field) cms 09/09/11 22:52 cst flg
content.summary: Wife and i looking for shooting stars and a space ship or ufo flew passed us over the apartments flying over 100 mils an hour at illegal flying space...

content.detailedDescription:
I realize that as a senior you may think it odd to share this story after so many years.  i have told it to my family..But they like everyone i ever met just..Look at me and roll eyes. this took place apx 1956 i was in 5th grade, 

i was walking to my elementary school this is the same street i lived on was about halfway to school when i noticed on ground on the grass a pool of light...Not a beaming thing..It was flat..Light...Dont know how to explain that except i dont recall it having any height...It was a small circle of light...If you could pour light on the ground thats exactly what i saw...Just a pool of light.

since i am now in my sixties...You can imagine people say it was a sun beam. this was apx 7:30 in morning and no this was no sun beam.   because when i saw it......And walked over to it  it backed up..I again went toward it and it backed up again... i just stopped and looked at it...It then moved...Like a puddle of light  off the grass down the curb and accross the street, about half way to other side of street i heard someone say "you will be late for school"   , i followed it and it went up the curb like it had went down ...And stayed their for a moment...I really wanted to touch it..But it then  started to move away from me and went so fast it was gone 

i been married 47 years, i told my parents...My husband, my children and my grand children...No one understands that i have no explaination for what i saw that day.  its frustrating that we cannot validate this to our family on something that is witnessed only by yourself, and as a child i did not have a clue what i was seeing..  i do know i told my parents i saw an angel that day...

i am retired ..And i am trying to inquire if you have a data base for people like myself who see something odd that is not explainable, even in this day and age.  my family gets embarrassed that i should even look into this after all these years..But in my mind, i would just like to know what it was i saw.

apx one year later.1957 (best guess).Their was an article in our local paper and no i cant remember what it was entitled..But it was a sighting by a lady who lived just few blocks from us...It was in the paper i do know that much..She saw a something outside her window that (it was like a small ball....I cant remember much about but will try to locate that aricle if i get to visit family  who still live in that town.

if you able to help me understand this i would appreicate it very much.
content.summary: Small pool of light,  5th grade, it was on the grass, when i approached it backed up..Couple times

content.detailedDescription:
-3rd party report from civilian witness. under investigation at this time, please contact me for further details if needed. 

i received a report of a large craft hovering over grays hwy (hwy 278) cross street wooden horse run on the sharp curve.

caller was very upset and stated that she just observed a large unidentified craft move and hover in front of her car from the sod farm fields next to the hwy at tree top level. the current information i have is that the craft had an unknown number of bright white lights surrounding it or encircling it, after hovering for a moment it then departed at a very high rate of speed and was visible again in the distance through the trees on the opposite side of the hwy for a moment.

note: i have also found that this isn't uncommon for that area and that in the past a vehicle was "pursued" or tracked by a similar object. obviously many of these reports are not readily shared. i also made a report about 2 years ago in which myself and a number of other emergency responders witnessed similar lighted crafts within 15min north of that area from different locations.
content.summary: Large craft hovering over highway surrounded by bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my grandparents in grafton, ohio when i pointed out to my neighb or what looked like 40 or so bright redish orange circles! thought ufo's were talk but after seeing that it made my mind different. i was paranoid all night. my neighbor almost instantly went blank for quite some time. watched until they flew away 10 minutes or so later. they were all migrating as it looked. some waited, some kept going. others seemed to be watching, almost as a tour of our planet. attmpted several times to get video or camera...Neither would show the lights. would show everything else in picture, but the lights and they were very b right!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Group of 40 or so red large circles!! unbelievable!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on bi-pass from goshen to south bend, in. i saw them to my left in the distance about 5 minutes from the 331 exit . there was a plane , that was going over the road back and forth , looked like it was crop dusting, but it wasn't. it looked like someone was practicing flying, but going back and forth over the road. saw this about 2 minutes after ufo sightings.
content.summary: 5 black objects , that were fast, smaller then a plane flew through air, like birds migrating in a group. flew straight, and fast, were gone within a minute.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of the way the sun frames the clouds with the sun behind the cloud cover. with the sun totally obscured the very edges of the clouds appear to be outlined in an extremely bright outline of light.
i took 2 photos and did not see anything with the naked eye except the clouds where i was aiming my kodak easy share cx7430  digital camera.
when i downloaded the pictures to my computer i saw the transparent triangle ufo in one of the pictures. the pictures were only taken a second apart.
content.summary: Transparent triangle object with black dot near front

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were riding our bicycles as young teenagers on a rural road in southeast missouri in the town of deering. we were riding from the high school down the road to his house. all the sudden we looked to the left of us, and there it was, a yellowish orange orb floating about five feet off the ground next to us, keeping the same speed as the bikes. i have to say it scared us,and we didn't have far to go, we sped up and didn't look back. to this day, i don't know what it was, but never forgot.

the above is just the first strange siting. now living in new jersey, and grown with children, retired new jersey air national guard,something else happened. one day after work, 4:30 pm in the fall of 2010 i had arrived home from work. i sat back on the bed upstairs to rest and noticed while looking through our closet door mirrors, which was inline with the window, at the trees outside and i noticed an outline in the trees. the figure was very tall and thin, looked to be seven feet in height with long arms. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i thought the tree bark was playing a trick on me, but i stayed in place to study it. as i mentioned, it was tall and very thin, had the large head and black eyes and the limbs were away from the tree trunk. it seemed to be looking at me through the mirror. so i thought maybe it doesn't notice me looking at it because i was viewing him through a mirror. so after a few minutes, i decided to actually get up and look through the window. i did, and wasn't able to find it. i then went to the bed, same position and looked through the closet door mirrors again. i couldn't find what i had saw previously. 
i don't know what it was, if anything, but it still bothers me.
be advised, i don't need to be contacted, just wanted to tell someone other than my family.
content.summary: Yellowish/orange in color floating ball/orb.

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright orange ball with no noise that moved north to south .
content.summary: It was like a bright orange ball that moved north south

content.detailedDescription:
I think it was around 11 pm, maybe earlier or maybe later.  i was with a companion, walking on michigan state university's campus.  we were walking back towards the stadium, crossing the bridge over the river, the one closest to wells hall, when i noticed the lights.  at first i only noticed the four, and pointed them out to my companion.  i also pointed them out to two female students passing over the bridge at the same time.  

 the light pollution illuminated the clouds, as did the objects.  they appeared to be heading towards the stadium.  i'm not sure what direction i was facing, but the stadium was to my right and the objects to my left in the sky.  after watching for about thirty seconds or a minute, i told my companion that they reminded me of the phoenix lights, something i had seen on youtube a couple of years ago, which turned out to be flares.  i suggested that these might be flares because the color was similar.  he pointed out, correctly i think, that the objects were moving steadily (albeit slowly, without making any sound) to the right, towards the university, and that they were not breaking formation.  they were not simply hovering and flailing about.  there was wind, so i would think that balloons with flares should have been moving about more.  at least, one would think.  then i saw a fifth light trailing the others, following at the same pace and in the same direction but not part of the rhomboid formation.  i then realized that the lights might just have been points on a much larger object that was obscured by the clouds.  a short while later, they faded away behind the clouds.  

 unfortunately i couldn't take any photos because my sd card slot on my phone is defective.  not sure what it was, if the lights were solitary objects or if it was part of a larger object, but it was a little eerie and unsettling.  i'm pretty sure that extraterrestrial intelligence exists as a matter of probability, but i don't personally subscribe to the belief that sentient extraterrestrial life visits earth on a regular basis and is responsible for ufo sightings.  this is the only time that i have ever truly seen something that i would describe as an unidentified and unidentifiable flying object.  i kept thinking it was possible that it could be a hoax but i don't know what the mechanism would have been.
content.summary: Five lights.  four were arranged in shape of rhomboid parallelogram and moved over msu stadium.  the other was tailing the four.
